(Simplified: 荦)
Chinese Definition:
①雜色牛，引申爲雜色：怒犖(狂怒的雜色牛)。駁犖。
②特出，明顯：卓犖(特出)。犖犖(分明，明顯，如“犖犖大端”)。
犖犖大端 [ luò luò dà duān ]: major items; salient points (idiom)
犖犖大者 [ luò luò dà zhě ]: major items; salient points (idiom)

犖字的基本解释

犖
luò
见“荦”。

犖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luò］
［《廣韻》吕角切，入覺，來。］
“荦1”的繁体字。
(1)杂色牛。
(2)文彩交错貌。参见“駁犖”。
(3)明确，分明。
(4)嶙峋貌。参见“犖确”。
(5)坚硬貌。参见“犖确”。
(6)古地名。在今河南省淮阳县西南。

犖字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页703第22
【唐韻】呂角切【集韻】【韻會】力角切，?音䃕。【說文】駁牛也。从牛，勞省聲。【廣韻】駁犖，牛雜色。　又【廣雅】丁犖，牛屬。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】赤瑕駁犖。【註】司馬彪曰：駁犖，采點也。　又【史記·天官書】此其犖犖大者。【註】索隱曰：犖犖，事之分明也。　又【廣韻】卓犖。【韻會】卓犖，超絕也。【班固·典引】卓犖乎方州。　又人名。【左傳·莊三十二年】圉人犖。　又【集韻】力各切，音樂。牛駁色。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luò］
["Guangyun" Lv Jiao cuts, enters the senses, come. ]
Traditional characters for "荦1".
(1) Variegated cattle.
(2) Staggered appearance of text and color. See "Referral".
(3) Clear and distinct.
(4) Rugged appearance. See "Ning Que".
(5) Hard appearance. See "Ning Que".
(6) Ancient place names. In today's southwest of Huaiyang County, Henan Province.

[Siji 2] [Bull Character Department] 　荦; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 703 22
[Tang Yun] Lv Jiaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Li Jiaoqie,? Yin Deng. 【Said the text】Refuse the cow. From the cattle, the labor saves the sound. [Guangyun] Barley, variegated.　[Guang Ya] Ding Nao, bovine.　[Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] The red flaws replied Nun. [Note] Sima Biao said: To refute the nuo, take some points.　[Historical Records·Tian Guan Shu] This is the bigger one. [Note] Suo Yin said: Nun-Nuo, things are clear.　[Guang Yun] Zhuo Nao. [Rhyme Club] Zhuo Nao, superb. [Ban Gu·Dian Yin] Zhuo Nun is almost Fangzhou.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Zhuang Thirty-two Years] 圉人荦.　[Jiyun] Every effort is made, music. Cow barking color.
